alert.note: Alert for Essex; Morris; Passaic (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 24 at 9:55PM EST until December 25 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in New Jersey... Passaic River At Pine Brook affecting Essex, Passaic and Morris Counties. For the Passaic River...including Millington, Chatham, Pine Brook, Singac, Little Falls...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Passaic River at Pine Brook. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 19.0 feet, Street flooding begins in Fairfield including Camp Lane Road. Two Bridges Road is closed going into Lincoln Park and Wayne. At 19.5 feet, Horseneck Road in Fairfield is subject to flooding and closures. At 20.0 feet, Eagle Rock Avenue in Roseland is subject to flooding. Camp Lane Road, River Edge Drive and Broadway Lane in Fairfield are flooded. Stewart Place is closed. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 PM EST Sunday the stage was 19.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:15 PM EST Sunday was 19.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow morning and continue falling to 18.3 feet Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 19.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 19.2 feet on 06/16/1998. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Stream Fld Observed Fcsts (7 pm) Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Stg Time Date Passaic River Pine Brook 19.0 19.2 Sun 9 pm 18.8 18.5 Crested &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around...don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/phi. The next statement will be issued Monday morning at 1000 AM EST.
